m_szDocTitle: Audi Electric City Car In The Works? | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Audi Electric City Car In The Works? Originally published on EV Obsession . It has been a decade since the Audi A2 city car went out of production, and while the automaker “wants” to get back into the ultra-compact city car game, it just hasn’t quite gotten around to it. According to Automobile Magazine , though, an ultra-small Audi city car could be just around the corner, and it’s likely to come in gasoline, diesel, and electric flavors. Rather than utilizing the steadfastly simple New Small Family (NSF) platform underpinning the Volkswagen Up!, Audi and corporate partners Skoda and Seat are
